title: Noam Chomsky on the Future of the Left, Trumpism, and Wielding Power | Weekends
description:
Noam Chomsky joins Jacobin's Weekends show to talk about where the Left goes after Trump. Ana Kasparian and Nando Vila discuss the fallout of the Capitol riots and the role of the state in monitoring and suppressing domestic terrorism.

Read Noam Chomsky's latest interview in Jacobin: https://jacobinmag.com/2020/12/noam-chomsky-class-struggle-constitution-justice-us-imperialism

Every Saturday at 1 PM ET,  Ana Kasparian and Nando Vila are live with a new episode of Weekends.

Subscribe to the channel and press the like button!
Subscribe to Jacobin for just $10: https://jacobinmag.com/subscribe/?code=JACOBINYT
Join the Verso book club: https://www.versobooks.com/bookclub
Music provided by Zonkey: https://linktr.ee/zonkey

4:17 Liberals and the security state
49:23 Capitol protesters and the end of Trumpism
1:23:01 Noam Chomsky interview
